name: R&WATCH
description:
--R&WATCH DOBTOPUS--
I made it on a whim...
気まぐれで作った...

This is a mini-game recreated in the G&W style.

Try to hit the face in the middle of the screen while avoiding enemy attacks!

◆Controls

↑↓ : Select, move
Z key: Decide, shot
X key: Cancel

---

(All English is Google Translated from Japanese. .... The grammar may be wrong)

When the middle face of the large enemy on the right appears, hit it with your shot!The more gauge you have, the higher your score.

If you get hit by an enemy's attack, you will get one MISS, and if you get three, the game is over.

When the shot hits an enemy, the enemy bullets in the upper and middle sections will disappear. It's easier to survive if you shoot yourself after the enemy has fired a round.

At 200,500 points, all the MISS will disappear. ...Let's try to get more than 500 points.

---
( If you press the R key 6 times during the game, you can force stop and go back to the menu.)

[2021 06/06 1.00 up]
